official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to remove the "last employer" limitation on the receipt of certain annuities in cases where the employment concerned is part-time non-railroad employment.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to remove the "last employer" limitation on the receipt of certain annuities where the employment concerned is part-time nonrailroad employment.
